actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to continue until the close of June 30, 1982, the existing suspension of duties on concentrate of poppy straw.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend the duty-free entry of concentrate of poppy straw imported for use in producing codeine or morphine until June 30, 1982.

titles.title: A bill to continue until the close of June 30, 1982, the existing suspension of duties on concentrate of poppy straw.
